## makeVertexBufferType() function

Get the structure type of a vertex buffer by specified vertex attribute formats and the length of the vertex buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function makeVertexBufferType(length: number, ...attributes: VertexAttribFormat[]): PBStructTypeInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  length | number | The length of the vertex buffer |
|  attributes | [VertexAttribFormat](doc/markdown/./device.vertexattribformat.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The vertex attributes |

**Returns:**

[PBStructTypeInfo](doc/markdown/./device.pbstructtypeinfo.md)

The structure type of the vertex buffer
